title: Wind Engineering
description: An introductory course on wind energy and its potential; modeling and design of wind turbines; analysis of the economic benefits of wind turbine systems. Credit will not be awarded for both AE 6701 and ME 6701.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Cannot be enrolled in one of the following Levels:
__HEADER_1__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: AE 2020 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ME 3340 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
